meanings.definition: Cooked too long or at too high a temperature.
meanings.sent1: The overroasted chicken was dry and tough.
meanings.sent2: The chef accidentally overroasted the vegetables in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The overroasted marshmallows turned into charcoal briquettes.
meanings.sent4: The overroasted coffee beans emitted a bitter aroma.
meanings.sent5: The overroasted toast was as hard as a rock.

meanings.sent1: She overroasted the turkey, making it nearly inedible.
meanings.sent2: If you overroast the nuts, they will lose their natural flavor.
meanings.sent3: He overroasted the marshmallows until they resembled miniature bonfires.
meanings.sent4: The chef overroasted the garlic, filling the kitchen with a burnt smell.
meanings.sent5: The baker accidentally overroasted the bread, turning it into a blackened brick.
